description.ar:
أصبحت امرأة شريرة ماتت على يد زوجها في الرواية ، على وجه التحديد كشخصية داعمة تموت أثناء استخدامها كأداة للزواج السياسي من قبل والدها وشقيقها . وفي يوم من الأيام ، أحضر الأب أخيزا عريسها ... المشكلة أن الشخص الآخر هو الزوج الذي سيقتلني وأفضل فارس مقدس في الشمال الذي سيدمر الأسرة في المستقبل . أولا وقبل كل شيء ، يجب أن أجد طريقة للعيش . هناك العديد من الصعوبات مثل برودة الزوج ، وازدراء الدوق ، لكن يبدو أنه غير مؤذ للناس هنا . " لقد وقعت في حبك ! " لذا أرجوك أنقذني !

---

description.en:
In the original lines of the novel, I was a villainess—used as a political tool by my father and older brother—who ended up dying at the hands of my future husband.

To save his kingdom, my father desperately begged my fifth groom to take my hand in marriage. The problem is that the man I’m supposed to marry, the legendary knight of the North, is the same man who will end up murdering me and my entire family.

I have to find a way to survive.

Within the novel itself, there are many daunting challenges ahead of me: I have to find a way to save my husband’s little sister, win over my cold-hearted husband, and gain the support of the people of the North, all of whom currently despise me.

“I’m in love with you!”

So please, don’t kill me!

---
I thought I'd finally escaped my hellish life when I died in an airplane crash, but I fell into another nightmare when I awoke as Rudbeckia de Borgia, a minor villain from a historical novel destined to die at the hands of her husband, Iske van Omerta. Surviving with the dysfunctional Borgia family is hard enough, but now I have to marry the man who will kill me! Still, it’s okay, I just have to convince Iske, his family, and all his countrymen that I’m completely harmless! How hard can that be?

---

description.es:
Me convertí en Rudbekia, la villana dentro de una novela de fantasía que sería asesinada a manos de su marido. El maldito de mi padre, ya ha decidido con quien me volveré a casar a través de un matrimonio político. El principal problema, es que mi futuro esposo es quien me matara. Necesito encontrar una forma de sobrevivir. Si actuó inofensivamente ante la gente del Norte, si protejo a la hermana de mi marido, a quien maté en la historia original, y si finjo estar completamente enamorada de él, ¿tal vez me perdone la vida? —¡Me he enamorado de tí! ¡Así que por favor sálvame!

description.fa:
در قسمت های اصلی رمان، من یه فرد شرور بودم که توسط پدر و برادر بزرگترم به عنوان یه ابزار سیاسی استفاده میشدم و در نهایت به دست شوهر آیندم کشته شدم. پدرم برای نجات پادشاهی خودش به شدت به داماد پنجم التماس میکرد که با من ازدواج کنه. مشکل اینه که مردی که قراره باهاش ازدواج کنم، شوالیه افسانه ای شمال، همون مردیه که در نهایت من و تمام خانوادم رو میکشه. "باید راهی برای زنده موندن پیدا کنم." داخل خود رمان چالش های دلهره آور زیادی پیشه رو هس. من باید راهی برای نجات خواهر کوچک شوهرم پیدا کنم، بر ظاهر سرد شوهرم پیروز شم، حمایت مردم شمال رو به دست بیارم و دربرابر اتفاقات عجیب با موجودات عجیبی دووم بیارم که در حال حاضر همه اینا منو به یه فرد انتقام جو تبدیل میکنن. "عاشق توعم!" "پس لطفاً منو نکش!"

description.fr:
Dans le roman, elle est devenue une méchante qui est morte des mains de son mari. Pour être plus précis, elle est devenue un personnage secondaire qui est morte en étant utilisée comme un outil pour un mariage politique par son père et son frère. Un jour, mon satané père est sorti en rampant et a choisi mon cinquième marié. Le problème est que la personne choisie était le meilleur paladin du Nord et la personne même qui me tuera moi et ma famille dans le futur. D’abord, je dois trouver un moyen de vivre. Dans le roman, avant de trouver un moyen de sauver ma belle-sœur qui allait mourir de mes mains, il y a de nombreux défis que je dois surmonter. Par exemple, faire fondre l’extérieur froid de mon mari, gagner les faveurs des gens du Nord et surmonter le mépris du duc. Si je peux surmonter ces défis, ma vie ne sera-t-elle pas sauvée plus tard? «Je suis tombé amoureux de toi !» Alors s’il te plaît, épargne-moi!

---
Une jeune coréenne est réincarnée dans le corps de Rudbeckia de Borgia, la seule fille du pape. Cependant, Rudbeckia est destinée à mourir des mains de son époux après avoir été utilisée comme outil dans un mariage politique. Prenant les devants pour changer son destin, elle décide de gagner l'affection de Izek van Omerta du royaume de Britannia, paladin, neveu du roi et héritier du duché d'Omerta. Rudbeckia pourra-t-elle empêcher le meurtre de sa belle-sœur, assassinat qui lui avait coûté la vie? Et Izek, celui qui est supposé tuer Rudbeckia dans le futur, se rangera-t-il aux côtés de son épouse?

---

description.it:
Nelle righe originali del romanzo, ero una malvagia, usata come strumento politico da mio padre e mio fratello maggiore, che finì per morire per mano del mio futuro marito. Per salvare il suo regno, mio padre pregò disperatamente Isaac di Omerta di sposarmi. Il problema è che l'uomo che dovrei sposare, il leggendario cavaliere del Nord, è lo stesso uomo che finirà per uccidere me e tutta la mia famiglia. Devo trovare un modo per sopravvivere! All'interno del romanzo stesso, ci sono molte sfide scoraggianti: devo trovare un modo per salvare la sorellina di mio marito, conquistare il mio freddo marito e ottenere il sostegno della gente del Nord, che attualmente mi disprezza. "Sono innamorata di lei!" Riuscirò nell'impresa?

---
In un romanzo, è diventata una malvagia che è morta tra le mani di suo marito. Per la precisione, come "attrice" non protagonista, una cattiva che muore dopo essere stata utilizzata come strumento per un matrimonio strategico da suo padre e suo fratello. Un giorno, il mio dannato padre ha strisciato e ha offerto la mia mano al mio quinto sposo. Il problema è che lui è proprio il marito che mi ucciderà e il miglior paladino del nord che in futuro distruggerà la mia famiglia. Per prima cosa, devo trovare un modo per sopravvivere. Nel romanzo ci sono molte difficoltà, come il freddo disprezzo di mio marito, l'odio e il bisogno di controllo dei nordisti e il disprezzo dei contadini, prima di trovare un modo per salvarmi la vita, dovrò risolvere diversi problemi. "Sono innamorata di te!" Quindi, per favore, salvami!

---

description.ko:
판타지 소설 속 남편의 손에 죽는
악역 조연, ‘루드베키아’가 되었다.

이 세계의 망할 아버지는 내 정략결혼 상대를 또 물어왔다.
문제는 그 상대가 바로 날 죽이게 될 남편이라는 것!

일단은 살길을 찾아야 한다.

북부 사람들에게 최대한 무해하게 보이면서
원작에서 내가 죽일 남편의 여동생도 지키고,
남편에겐 사랑에 빠진 척하면 목숨은 살려주지 않을까?

“전 당신한테 반해버렸어요!”

그러니까 제발 살려줘!

description.pt:
Me tornei ‘Rudbeckia’, uma coadjuvante em uma história de fantasia, uma vilã que morre pelas mãos de seu marido. O pior pai do mundo me achou outro parceiro para um casamento político. O problema é, essa pessoa é o marido que vai me matar! Primeiro, preciso achar uma forma para viver. Preciso parecer o mais inofensiva possível para o povo do norte e proteger a irmãzinha do meu marido que matei na história original. Não seria capaz de salvar minha vida se fingisse estar apaixonada pelo meu marido?

“Me apaixonei por você à primeira vista!”

“Então, por favor, me poupe!”

---

description.ru:
Рудвекиа де Ворхиа является сикстинским ангелом и принцессой Романии, которой предначертано умереть от руки собственного мужа. После того как она стала обычным инструментом в руках верховного понтифика католической церкви и своего старшего брата, она вынуждена вступить в политический брак с лучшим паладином севера, который в будущем должен убить весь ее дом. Теперь девушка должна будет столкнуться с многочисленными трудностями, но ей придется приспособиться и выжить в новых условиях. Сначала ей придется доказать, что она не является опасностью для других людей, потому людям не стоит ее опасаться. Дальше же ей придется убедить всех людей в том, что она совершенно непричастна к делам понтифика и семьи.

description.tr:
Kocasının ellerinde ölen bir kötü kadın karakterin bedenine reenkarne oldum. Daha doğrusu, babası ve erkek kardeşi tarafından siyasi evlilik aracı olarak kullanılırken ölen bir yardımcı karakter oldum. Bir gün, lanet olası babam gitti ve beşinci kocamı seçti. Sorun şu ki, seçilen kişi Kuzey'in en iyi Paladin'i, dahası gelecekte beni ve ailemi öldürecek olan kişiydi. Önce yaşamanın bir yolunu bulmalıyım. Romanda benim ellerimde ölecek olan biricik kız kardeşini kurtarmanın bir yolunu bulmadan önce aşmam gereken birçok zorluk var. Kocamın soğuk yüzünü eritmek, Kuzeyli'nin beğenisini kazanmak ve Dük'ün küçümsemesini yenmek gibi. Bu zorlukların üstesinden gelebilirsem, hayatım sonunda kurtulmuş olmaz mı? "Sana aşık oldum!" Bu yüzden lütfen beni bağışla!

description.uk:
Вона стала злодійкою, яка померла від рук свого чоловіка в романі. Точніше, вона стала другорядною героїнею, яка померла, коли її батько і брат використовували як інструмент політичного шлюбу. По-перше, я маю знайти спосіб вижити у романі, знайти спосіб врятувати сестру мого чоловіка, яка в оригіналі померла від моїх рук, мені потрібно розтопити холодне серце мого чоловіка, завоювати прихильність населення та подолати презирство герцога. Якщо я зможу подолати ці труднощі, чи не буде моє життя врятовано пізніше? «Я закохався в тебе!» Тож будь ласка, пощади мене!

description.vi:
Trong cuốn tiểu thuyết gốc, tôi là một nhân vật phản diện - người được cha và anh trai sử dụng như một công cụ chính trị và cũng là người hết dưới tay chồng tương lai của mình. Để cứu vương quốc, cha tôi đã tuyệt vọng cầu xin chú rể nắm lấy tay tôi và kết hôn. Vấn đề là người đàn ông mà tôi phải kết hôn chính là hiệp sĩ huyền thoại của phương Bắc và cũng là người đàn ông sẽ tiêu diệt tôi và cả gia đình. Tôi phải tìm cách tồn tại. Trong cuốn tiểu thuyết, có rất nhiều thử thách khó khăn dc đặt ra cho tôi: tôi phải tìm cách cứu em gái của chồng mình, giành dc trái tim của người chồng lạnh lùng và có dc sự ủng hộ của người dân phương Bắc và tất cả những người hiện tại coi thường tôi. "Em yêu anh!" Vì vậy, xin anh đừng giết em!!

altTitles.ja: テニスの王子様

description.en:
Ryoma Echizen just joined the Seishun Academy's tennis team, which is known for being one of the most competitive teams in Japan. Its members are incredibly talented, gifted, and athletic. With rigorous and extremely intense practices, the upperclassmen of the team expect the very best from themselves and they expect even more from the new members of the team. While most of the freshmen are on pins and needles hoping they won't get cut from the team, Ryoma Echizen is confident, cool, and collected. Some might even say he's cocky, but at least he's got the skills to back up his attitude. With his virtually unreturnable "twist serve," Ryoma is sure to make the starting team.  
  
Join Ryoma and the other first years, as they train hard, make friends, and try to find a place for themselves on the team. Ryoma Echizen is the Prince of Tennis. He may be ready for the Seishun Academy tennis team, but are THEY ready for HIM?

Former NBA star Yoon Young-jae, who was out of the season due to an unexpected accident. An unexpected opportunity brings him back to the past.......I dream of taking a powerful leap forward once again in the NBA, where there are top stars!

title.en: The Person I Met In-Game Was Actually My Big Sister.

altTitles.ja: ゲーム内で知り合った人が実は姉弟だった

altTitles.ja-ro: Game Nai de Shiriatta Hito ga Jitsu wa Kyoudai datta

altTitles.ja: 複雑な姉弟の４コマ

altTitles.en: The Person I met in the game was actually My Big Sister.

description.en:
"Big Sis!?"
"Kouta!?"


The two of them were enjoying an in-game romance (without knowing each other's identities). Upon seeing each other's faces at their long-awaited offline meetup... they were both shocked to see that their partner was in fact their own sibling!?

These are complicated feelings for sure... and rather hard to accept!

(Source: [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/20068503/vol_no/001))
description.ja:
「姉ちゃん!?」
「康太!?」

＊

ゲーム内で恋愛を楽しんでいたふたり。
待ちに待ったオフ会で顔を合わせたら……相手はまさかの姉弟で!?
複雑なこの感情……なかなか飲み込むのは難しい！

ＳＮＳで話題のカオス展開ラブコメが、 描き下ろしを加えて待望の書籍化!!

description.en: Mini is a "Scum Detector", and her latest job is from a rich girl who wants to test her boyfriend's loyalty. However, her boyfriend, Zhao Yueming, is a straightforward gentleman, and Mini's usual methods don't work on him. This is a bit tricky for Mini, who is used to dealing with scumbags regularly. This game of tug-of-war between the womanizer and the one who understands them best is about to begin. Who will fall into the trap of love first?!

Random short comics of or relating to Genya. Rather than uploading them separately, we've uploaded them all under one title for your convenience. If you like them, please consider showing support for the artist by purchasing the doujinshi or by retweeting/liking the comic. You can find links to the author's Twitter in the comments section or credits page.

description.en: Aoyama is a handsome young soccer genius who's a Japan representative. His play style is "cleanliness." He doesn't tackle and doesn't head the ball. If he's doing a throw-in, he'll only do it if he's wearing gloves.
description.pl: Aoyama to przystojny, młody geniusz piłki nożnej, który reprezentuje Japonię. Jego styl gry to "czystość". Nie tackluje i nie główkuje piłki. Jeśli wykonuje wrzutkę, robi to tylko w rękawicach.

description.en: Tang San was a talented apprentice to the great Tang Sect. Due to mastering the forbidden Tang arts, he was pressured to jump off a cliff and died. However, he was reborn into another world filled with Essence Spirits. At the age of six, every person will have their essence spirit awoken. Spirits can take many forms: weapons, plants, and animals; They can help people with their daily lives. Outstanding spirits can be trained to engage in combat. A spirit master is the soul and heart of the Combat Continent! When Tang San turns six, a huge surprise awaits him. His peaceful life in this new world will change completely.

title.en: Don't Call Me a Naked Hero in Another World

altTitles.ja: 異世界で全裸勇者と呼ばないで

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai de Zenra Yuusha to Yobanaide

description.en:
You can get cheat skills in a different world, but...

Somehow, she has no clothes⁉

The naked comedy of the girl from a different world begins!

While bathing in a hot spring Runa Hatagami is mistakenly transferred to another world as a hero in a towel...

Moreover, the goddess only gave her a weird "Hot Spring" skill and a high defensive power?  She managed to get a bath towel with her skill, but she was still almost completely naked...

Furthermore, she was put under a certain "curse" by a witch who is planning to resurrect the Demon King... The situation makes it impossible for her to return to her original world?!

title.en: Genshiken Nidaime - The Society for the Study of Modern Visual Culture II

altTitles.ja: げんしけん 二代目

description.en:
Genshiken follows the lives of a group of college students drawn together by their shared hobbies, and the trials and adventures associated with being otaku.  
  
Genshiken Nidaime ("Second Generation") is a continuation of the previous series, with chapter numbering starting at 56.

An unlikely relationship blossoms. Do opposites attract? Or will their differences tear them apart? Follow the story of the goth girl Ophelia and the popular footballer Tyler, as they go through their high school life, sitting next to each other in class!
description.pt-br: Uma relação improvável floresce. Será que opostos se atraem? Ou suas diferenças os separarão? Acompanhe a história da garota gótica chamada Ophelia e do popular jogador de futebol americano Tyler, enquanto passam por sua vida escolar, sentados um ao lado do outro na sala de aula!

Of course, viewers are excited, but will those being watched feel the same excitement...?
 Brought to you by mmk of 'Love Comedy Quest,' this is a pure love short comedy of the new era about 'neighbors'!

title.en: How to Gracefully Divorce a Dragon

altTitles.en: How to Divorce a Dragon Beautifully

description.en:
Twenty-year-old Jeong Seyun, a rabbit descendant, knows that dragons are considered the chaebols of the beast world. But she'd rather have a relationship based on love than an arranged marriage with a dragon. And as fate would have it, as soon as she enters college, she falls in love with fox descendant Kim Hangyeol at first sight! She musters up the courage to confess, but... to the wrong person?!
Will Seyun's dream of a romance come true? (Summary adapted from Kakaopage.)

Immediately after Gu Changge realized he had transgressed into a fantasy world, the world's protagonist, and fortune's chosen, vowed to take revenge on him. Envied by all, not only is the female lead head over heels for him, but he's also treated as a distinguished guest wherever he goes. Fortunately, Gu Changge's prestige and power are superior to everyone else's, so shouldn't it be easy to trample on a mere fortune's chosen?

Hold on… There’s a system dedicated to milking and harvesting the protagonist? Gu Changge smirked. “Seems like even fate wants me to fulfill my destiny as the villain of this world!”
description.fr: Dès que Gu Changge s’est rendu compte qu’il avait transgressé un monde imaginaire, le protagoniste de ce monde, l’élu de la fortune, a juré de se venger de lui. Envié par tous, non seulement la femme principale est folle de lui, mais il est également traité comme un invité de marque partout où il va. Heureusement, le prestige et le pouvoir de Gu Changge sont supérieurs à ceux de tous les autres, alors il ne devrait pas être facile de piétiner un simple élu de la fortune ?
description.id:
Begitu Gu Changge menyadari dia telah masuk ke sebuah dunia fantasi, protagonis dunia itu yang dengan beruntungnya terpilih, bersumpah untuk melakukan balas dendam terhadapnya. Semua orang sangat iri pada Protagonis itu, karena bukan hanya karakter utama wanita tergila-gila padanya, tapi dia juga selalu diperlakukan sebagai tamu kehormatan kemanapun dia pergi. Untungnya, martabat dan kekuatan Gu Changge jauh melebihi milik orang lain, sehingga dia tidak dengan mudah jatuh di tangan orang yang hanya terpilih karena keberuntungannya?

 

Tunggu dulu… ada sistem yang didedikasikan untuk meraup dan mengambil dari apa yang dimiliki protagonis? Gu Changge tersenyum. “Sepertinya takdir pun ingin aku memenuhi takdirku sebagai orang jahat di dunia ini!”
description.pl: Gu Changge zostaje przeniesiony do świata wuxia, gdzie z miejsca staje się obiektem nienawiści protagonisty, będącego Wybrańcem Losu, gdyż nie dość, że główna bohaterka rzuca mu się w ramiona, to jeszcze jest przez wszystkich traktowany niczym znamienity gość. Na szczęście jego postać cechuje znacząca siła, więc powinien bez trudu zmiażdżyć jakiegoś w czepku urodzonego dzieciaka, prawda? “Chwila… Otrzymałem wyspecjalizowany system, który pozwala mi okradać głównego bohatera ze szczęścia?” Gu Changge uśmiechnął się znacząco. “Zdaje się, że moim przeznaczeniem jest podążanie ścieżką prowadzącą do stania się największym czarnym charakterem w tym świecie!”
description.ru:
Гу Чангэ попадает в фэнтези-мир, где, по-классике, оказывается в шкуре главного козла отпущения.
Удивительно, что главный герой сразу же снизыскал расположение у императрицы, чем вызвал бурю ненависти в свой адрес. К счастью, Чангэ - уважаемый человек в городе и единственное, что его спасает от кары в данной ситуации это высокий статус в обществе. Подождите-ка... а вы уже знаете, что здесь есть необычная система рангов, в которой присутствуют яркие герои всех мастей? Проанализировав события, герой понимает, что выгоднее всего вжиться в свою новую роль и пойти по пути персонажа-злодея!
description.pt-br: Imediatamente após Gu Changge perceber que havia transmigrado para um mundo de fantasia, o protagonista do mundo, e o escolhido da fortuna, jurou se vingar dele. Invejado por todos, ele não só tem a liderança feminina de ponta-cabeça por ele, mas também é tratado como um distinto convidado onde quer que vá. Felizmente, o prestígio e o poder de Gu Changge são superiores aos de todos os outros, então não deveria ser fácil pisar em uma mera escolha da fortuna? Espere … Existe um sistema dedicado à ordenha e colheita do protagonista? Gu Changge sorriu. “Parece que até o destino quer que eu cumpra meu destino como o vilão deste mundo!”

altTitles.ja: ドクムシThe Ruins Hotel

description.en: Six members of the occult circle will spend a few days at a ruined love hotel during their summer vacation. Upon arrival they meet two additional people who join them, but in the morning of the second day, a female member was found tied & naked. In addition, the exit was locked by someone and the building became a completely enclosed cage. Will this be a repeat of the 'kodoku' that happened 3 years ago?

altTitles.ja: 検死の神

description.en: Forensic Scientist Kim Junghoon lies dead in the National Forensic Service’s autopsy room. He died full of regret after witnessing his work partner of 20 years, Kim Sangjin, distorted his very own autopsy report when he was still conscious and accused him of committing suicide. Right after he passed away, Kim Junghoon opened his eyes once more and found himself back in 2002 when he was still a rookie in the National Forensic Service. His final wish came true as he got himself one more chance to fix his past!

A world in which Korea is the global capital of combat sports. At Nam-Il High School where the best and most talented students of martial arts reside, Jiu Ji-Tae suddenly finds himself thrust into their midst despite being a total weakling.  
  
By neutralizing his physical shortcomings through jiu-jitsu, can he rise to the top of the fight classes?  


---
description.fr:
Un monde dans lequel la Corée est le Pays leader des sports de combats. Au lycée Nam-il où les meilleurs et plus talentueux élèves en arts martiaux étudient, Jiu Ji-tae se trouve soudainement entraîné avec eux alors qu'il n'est qu'un faiblard.  
  
En faisant disparaître ses défauts physiques à l'aide du Ju-Jitsu, pourra-t-il devenir le meilleur des classes de combat ?  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/mymmx89)
description.pt-br:
Em um mundo onde a Coréia do Sul é a capital mundial dos esportes de combate, o Colégio Namil é onde os melhores e mais talentosos estudantes de artes marciais competem, e nosso protagonista Jiu Jitei se encontra subitamente em meio à eles mesmo sendo um fracote completo.
  
Superando suas fraquezas com jiu-jitsu, será que Jitei consegue chegar ao topo das turmas de luta?

altTitles.ja: 木曜日のフルット

description.en: Furutto is a cat that leads a double life. On one hand, he's the companion of a young woman in an apartment building named Kujirai, who feeds him (when she hasn't gambled away her meager manga-assistant's paycheck) and spends time with him in her apartment. On the other hand, he wants to keep his street cred as a stray cat and spends a good amount of time hanging out with the other strays, trying to steal food out of trash cans and rumbling with the cats from the next town over.

description.en: A romantic comedy about Yuri Tsuguto, who has clairvoyance but isn’t good at it, and Misumi Mitsuhashi, a girl who likes strange things. One day, when I look at Misumi’s back, who has a favor, I notice that the jacket is transparent and the message “People who read this come to the club room of the astronomical department after school.” When he went to the club room and explained his clairvoyance ability, Misumi was excited and asked, “Why don’t you let me study you?”

altTitles.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

description.en:
Aijo Rentaro has asked a hundred girls out and struck out every time. In desperation, he prays for guidance, only to be told by a god that his rejections were due to a cosmic mishap! Now this god will set things right by making sure Aijo gets one hundred dates. 

Except, as things often go with gods, there’s a catch: each of his one hundred dates is Aijo’s destined soulmate! Worse, if he doesn’t return their feelings, they’ll all die in horrible - and hilarious - accidents!
description.ru: Что может быть хуже отказа на признание в любви? Сотня отказов на признание в любви! Айдзё Рэнтаро – безнадёжный романтик, признавшийся в любви уже сто раз, но по необъяснимым причинам каждый раз получавший отказ. В один прекрасный день перед ним предстаёт сам Бог Любви и говорит, что его ужасная удача в любви обернулась вспять! Теперь Айдзё предстоит встретить 100 девушек "Соулмейтов" – каждая из них предназначена ему самой судьбой и без памяти влюблена в него! Но вот беда: ни у одного человека не должно быть столько соулмейтов. Если он не ответит хоть одной из них взаимностью, девушку ждёт смерть от несчастного случая! Теперь это дело любви и смерти, а выбор за Айдзё.
description.pt-br: Aijou é um garoto que tem muito azar no amor e já foi rejeitado mais de 100 vezes. Desesperado ele vai num templo pedir ajuda aos deuses. E seu desejo foi atendido, para cada rejeição ele terá uma alma gêmea. Mas isso se tona uma maldição quando ele fica sabendo que se elas não forem felizes ao lado de sua alma gêmea, ele, elas vão morrer… Mas que merda, você ainda está lendo isso? Não escutou? São 100 garotas, 100! Não há tempo a perder!

description.en: A deformed female human goes out with a pumpkin on her head to kill all those who bullied her in the past after escaping from a mental hospital.
description.es: Una deforme chica sale con una calabaza en su cabeza para matar a todos aquellos que la acosaron en su pasado después de escapar de un manicomio.
description.fr: Victime de sévices orchestrés aux yeux de tous par ses camarades de classe, une collégienne a été interné dans un hôpital psychiatrique. Plusieurs mois plus tard, alors que ses bourreaux sont aujourd’hui au lycée, ils apprennent qu’elle s’est échappée en tuant tout le personnel hospitalier qui a tenté de lui barrer la route et qu’elle est bien décidé à se venger d’eux.

description.pt-br: Uma mulher deformada sai com uma abóbora na cabeça para matar todos aqueles que fizeram bullying com ela no passado depois de escapar de um hospital psiquiátrico.

description.en:
An official spin-off of the the super famous fantasy "The Eminence in Shadow".  
OP main character × isekai reincarnation × misunderstandings!? This is the beginning of a spin-off of the super-famous web novel isekai fantasy "The eminence in Shadow".  
Cid is a boy who reincarnated in another world, and decided to enjoy a scenario of being "the eminence in shadow, someone who meddles with the story from the shadows, and exhibits his true power in secrecy". Thus unfolds the story of him and the secret organization he leads—shadow garden—as well their their pleasant friends! An easy-going 4-koma manga starts right here and now!

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en:
Iruma Suzuki, fourteen years old, can’t say no to any request. His irresponsible parents make him work dangerous job after dangerous job to support them, and then one day they sell him to a demon! But, much to his surprise, the demon wants to adopt Iruma as his grandson? Unable to refuse his request, Iruma becomes the grandson of the great demon Sullivan. His new doting demon grandfather enrolls him in Demon School Babyls – where Sullivan is coincidentally the principal. Thus begins Iruma-kun's extraordinary school life among the otherworldly, meeting many colorful demons, taking on daunting challenges, and facing his true self as he rises to become someone great. 

Cozy magical slice of life with occasional urban terrorism.
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

altTitles.ja: 少年のアビス

description.en:
In a town with nothing, in the middle of a daily life with seemingly no signs of change, high schooler Reiji Kurose was "just" living. Family, dreams for the future, childhood friends were all binding him down to that city. He thought he would "just" keep on living like that.

Until he met her.

Is there hope in living? Is there light waiting ahead?

It's the start of a boy meets girl series which reflects the "now."
description.fr:
Dans une ville vide, au milieu d'une vie quotidienne répétitive, Reiji Kurose, lycéen, ne faisait que " vivre". 
Sa famille, ses rêves d'avenir, ses amis d'enfance. Tous ces éléments le liaient à cette ville. 
Il pensait qu'il continuerait "juste" à vivre jusqu'à la fin, jusqu'à ce qu'il la rencontre. 
Y a-t-il de l'espoir dans la vie ? Y a-t-il de la lumière dans l'avenir ? 
C'est le début d'une série de rencontres entre garçons et filles qui reflète le présent!
description.ru: В пустом городке, в разгаре своей повседневной жизни, казалось бы, "просто" жил старшеклассник Рэйдзи Куросе. Семья, мечты о будущем, друзья детства - все это привязывало его к своему родному городу. Он думал, что будет продолжать так жить и никогда ничего не изменит. Пока он не встретил ту самую. Есть ли надежда в жизни? Есть ли впереди свет? Это начало серии "мальчик, повстречавший девочку", которая отражает "сейчас".
description.tr: Reiji Kurose, hiçbir şeyin olmadığı ve görünüşe bakılırsa hiçbir değişimin de olmayacağı bir kasabada ot gibi yaşıyordu. Ailesi, gelecek hayalleri ve çocukluk arkadaşları... Hepsi onu o şehre zincirliyordu. Kendince böyle yaşar giderim diyordu. Taa ki onunla tanışıncaya dek. Yaşamanın bir manası var mı? Beni bekleyen bir gelecek var mı? Oğlan ve kızın tanışmasıyla trajedi kapıları aralanır...
description.vi: Một bộ truyện đầy u ám cùng tác giả với Hatsukoi Zombie. Trong một thị trấn nhàm chán và ngày qua ngày không có gì thay đổi, Reiji Kurose, một học sinh trung học vốn luôn "sống" như "đã chết". Gia đình, tương lai, bạn thời thơ ấu. Tất cả đều trói buộc cậu vào thị trấn này. Cậu luôn nghĩ bản thân đã "chết" cho đến khi gặp được cô gái ấy. Hy vọng nào thắp sáng cho cuộc đời tăm tối của hai người? câu chuyện về hành trình tìm đến "cái chết" để được "sống" chính thức bắt đầu.

altTitles.ja: 無力聖女と無能王女～魔力ゼロで召喚された聖女の異世界救国記～

altTitles.ja-ro: Muryoku Seijo to Munou Oujo ~Maryoku Zero de Shoukansareta Seijo no Isekai Kyuukokuki~

altTitles.en: The Helpless Saint and the Powerless Princess
The Helpless Saint and the Powerless Princess ~The Story of How a Saint With No Magic Was Summoned to Save Another World~

description.en:
One day, listless part-timer Tamura Nana was summoned out of her room and into another world, after which her summoners declared her a saint and asked her to save their world. However, though she was hailed as a saint, it turned out that Nana possessed no magical power at all! To make matters worse, she was chosen as a partner by a princess who can't use magic... 

The helpless saint who has no magic and the powerless princess who can't use magic. And so begins the adventure of these two leftover heroes!

[Official site](https://www.ichijinsha.co.jp/yurihime/title/%e7%8e%89%e5%b4%8e%e3%81%9f%e3%81%be/%e7%84%a1%e5%8a%9b%e8%81%96%e5%a5%b3%e3%81%a8%e7%84%a1%e8%83%bd%e7%8e%8b%e5%a5%b3%ef%bd%9e%e9%ad%94%e5%8a%9b%e3%82%bc%e3%83%ad%e3%81%a7%e5%8f%ac%e5%96%9a%e3%81%95%e3%82%8c%e3%81%9f%e8%81%96%e5%a5%b3/)

title.en: Shin no Jitsuryoku wa Girigiri Made Kakushite Iyou to Omou

altTitles.en: I Think I'll Hide My True Ability to the Last Moment

altTitles.ja-ro: Shin no Jitsuryoku wa Girigiri Made Kakushiteiyou to Omou

altTitles.ru: Я думаю скрывать свои истинные способности до последнего момента

altTitles.ja: 真の実力はギリギリまで隠していようと思う

altTitles.zh-hk: 我想將真正的實力隱藏到極限

altTitles.pt-br: Acho Que Vou Esconder Minha Verdadeira Habilidade Até O Último Momento

altTitles.fr: Je vais garder mes véritables capacités secrètes jusqu'à la dernière minute.

description.en:
A world where you can form a pact with gods and gain skills. Born as the third son of a famous knight family, Yuno was so busy controlling his innate power that he was eventually called "incompetent.".
However, in the magical knight academy, where he was enrolled for some reason, he fulfilled his fateful encounter with an unnamed god who was despised as "incompetent" like himself..  
Yuno, who formed a pact with the goddess and named her [Athena], secretly decided to make her the highest god, and decided to get a little more serious.
description.fr: Un monde où l'on peut conclure un pacte avec les dieux et acquérir des compétences. Troisième fils d'une célèbre famille de chevaliers, Yuno était tellement occupé à contrôler son pouvoir inné qu'il a fini par être qualifié d'"incompétent"... Cependant, à l'académie des chevaliers magiques, où il était inscrit pour une raison quelconque, il a fait la rencontre fatidique d'un dieu sans nom qui était méprisé pour son "incompétence"...  Yuno, qui a conclu un pacte avec la déesse et l'a nommée [Athéna], a secrètement décidé de faire d'elle le dieu suprême, et a décidé d'être un peu plus sérieuse.
description.id:
Dunia di mana kau dapat membuat kontrak dengan dewa dan memperoleh skill. Terlahir sebagai putra ketiga dari keluarga ksatria terkenal, Yuno begitu sibuk mengendalikan kekuatan bawaannya sehingga dia akhirnya disebut sebagai "tidak kompeten".  
Tapi, di akademi ksatria sihir, dia terdaftar karena suatu alasan, dia bertemu dengan dewa yang dipandang rendah sebagai "tidak kompeten" seperti dirinya ..  
Yuno, yang membuat kontrak dengan dewa dan menamainya [Athena], diam-diam memutuskan untuk menjadikannya dewa tertinggi, dan memutuskan untuk menjadi sedikit lebih serius.
description.pt-br: Um mundo onde você pode fazer um contrato com Deus e ganhar habilidades. Nascido como o terceiro filho de uma famosa família de cavaleiros, Yuno estava tão ocupado controlando seu poder inato que acabou sendo chamado de "incompetente".No entanto, na academia do cavaleiro mágico, que foi matriculado por algum motivo, ele cumpriu seu encontro fatídico com um deus sem nome que era desprezado como "incompetente" como ele.Yuno, que fez um contrato com a deusa e a chamou de [Athena], secretamente decidiu torná-la a deusa suprema e decidiu levar um pouco mais a sério seu destino.

altTitles.ja: マウントセレブ金田さん

description.en: Mochiko Kaneda (commonly known as Kaneda-san), a self-important, clumsy sanpaku-eyed celebrity lady, climbs to the top with overwhelming financial power!!

altTitles.ja: バーサス　イビル

description.en: Meet Asahi, a female college student possessed by a vengeful spirit without any of his memories among the living! This is the struggle of the two of them searching for his missing memories, a new-age über-stylish ghost battle manga!

altTitles.ja: ちえりの恋は8メートル

altTitles.pt-br: O amor de Chieri tem 8 metros

description.en:
An ordinary high school student, Yumeji Kotaki, is transferred to his class by his childhood friend, Chieri Omine, who has grown to 8 meters in height! Yumeji is assigned as "caretaker" to support Chieri's school life. Their daily life is full of excitement due to the height difference! The height difference is nothing to worry about!

The start of a literally larger-than-life romcom!
description.pt-br:
Uma aluna transferida que tem 8 metros de altura...?! 
Amigos de infância se reencontram, mas nem tudo é como antes… Uma mudança na relação entre Chieri e Yumeji, acompanhe o desenrolar desta comédia romântica gigantesca.

description.en:
The daily experiences of modern monster girls.   
  
Original comic by [Shepherd0821](https://mangadex.org/group/6025/shepherd0821), uploaded to MangaDex with permission.
In a strange city, there is a clinic that will treat the victims of horrific diseases. For a price.

altTitles.ja: meme娘

description.en: Memes, gaming consoles, and websites turned into anime girls! Please enjoy this compilation of meme comics, oneshots, and shorts from the team behind Merryweather Comics!
description.pl: Memy z internetu zostały zmienione w słodkie anime dziewczynki.
description.pt:
(Brazilian) / Português(Brasil): ||Memes da internet se tornaram garotas fofas de anime, criado por Merryweather e com arte por Princess Hinghoi.||  


---

**Links:**  
[Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/Merryweatherey)  
[Author's Youtube (with Dubbed Comics)](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvCtIO1it51jSkZGibS9R3w)
description.ru: Мемы из интернета, превращенные в милых анимешных девочек, создано Merryweather с иллюстрациями Princess Hinghoi.

description.en: Lin Tian, a genius game designer, was ordered to be executed because he knew too much of the company secrets. At a critical moment, he was betrayed by his lover Luo Yue and was killed in the jungle. When he woke up, he found he became a low-level monster in the jungle. In order to avenge the past, the male protagonist started on his path as a Monster in The Jungle.
description.fr: Lin Tian, un génie concepteur de jeux, a reçu l'ordre d'être exécuté parce qu'il en savait trop sur les secrets de l'entreprise. À un moment critique, il a été trahi par son amant Luo Yue et tué dans la jungle. Lorsqu'il s'est réveillé, il a découvert qu'il était devenu un monstre de bas niveau dans la jungle. Afin de venger le passé, le protagoniste a commencé son chemin en tant que monstre dans la jungle.

description.en: Ha Pung Gae, the elderly Taoist monk who has lived since the end of the Joseon Dynasty, achieves an unexpected breakthrough in the counter-retrogression movement. Despite this success, he is left with only approximately ten years in his remaining lifespan. To evade death, he must now embark on a journey to attain immortality!
description.fr: Ha Pung Gae, un vieux moine taoïste qui vit depuis la fin de la dynastie Joseon, réalise une percée inattendue dans le mouvement de lutte contre la régression. Malgré ce succès, il ne lui reste qu'une dizaine d'années à vivre. Pour échapper à la mort, il doit maintenant entreprendre un voyage pour atteindre l'immortalité !

title.en: I Thought She Was a Yandere, but Apparently She's Even Worse (Fan Colored)

altTitles.ja: ヤンデレかと思ったらもっとヤベー女だった

altTitles.ja-ro: Yandere ka to Omottara Motto Yabe Onna Datta

altTitles.en: I Thought She Was a Yandere

altTitles.id: Ku kira dia yandere tapi ternyata lebih parah

altTitles.tr: Onun Yandere Olduğunu Sanıyordum Ama Durum Daha Betermiş

description.en: A man who no longer can turn a blind eye saves a girl who's being bullied by the other classmate, but little did he know.
description.tr: Artık sınıf arkadaşının zorbalanmasına göz yumamayan çocuk sınıf arkadaşını kurtarır, oysa...

description.en:
In the era of astral pets, only the might of pets was essential! However, making the pets stronger has always been a slow and arduous process for pet warriors. That was until the appearance of a mysterious pet shop that changed everything!

The weakest skeleton could slay a great golden dragon with a single strike after training at this pet shop! Even the humble watchdog of the shop possessed ten legendary skills, and the female worker in the shop claimed to be a Goddess...

As for what the shopkeeper Su Ping thinks: I'm merely training these cute pets to become exceptional overlord beasts. What? Is it not normal?
- - -
In the era of beasts, pet strength determines everything! The battle pet master works hard and slowly to improve the strength of the pet. Until a mysterious pet store came out of nowhere!

In just a few days of cultivation, the lowly skeleton can kill the golden dragon with a single slash. Does the guard dog have ten secret skills of pet beats? The working girl even calls herself a god...

As for the owner, Su Ping: Isn't it a regular practice to breed cute pets into prehistoric king beasts?

altTitles.th: สงครามเย็นสุดขั้ว

description.en: The Ice Age apocalypse is coming. After being betrayed and killed by my secret crush, I was reborn and gained a magical ability - the snacks I ate suddenly turned into plants? What's surprising is that this ability can be used in this way... Crisis is everywhere, I want to live for myself in this life!

title.en: Tsukushitagari na Uchi no Yome ni Tsuite Derete mo Ii ka

altTitles.ja: 尽くしたがりなうちの嫁についてデレてもいいか？

altTitles.en: Can I Brag About My Very Devoted Wife To You?

altTitles.zh-hk: 我可以對無比賢惠的妻子撒嬌嗎？

altTitles.en: Can I Be Loving Towards My Wife Who Wants To Do All Kinds Of Things?

altTitles.pt-br: Posso amar minha esposa que quer fazer todo tipo de coisa?

altTitles.en: We Started A So Sweet Newlywed Life

description.en: There's the flower of Takamine High, Hanae Riko, whom every boy admires. Then, there's the plain boy, Niiyama Minato, who got proposed to by that most beautiful girl in school. Without knowing what's happening, the curtain on their newlywed life rises! For some reason, my bride, who's too cute and happily follows me around everywhere, refuses to leave my side...
description.ja:
「わ、私を……っ、あなたのお嫁さんにしてくれませんか……？」　学園一の美少女・花江りこに逆プロポーズされ、わけのわからないうちに、りことの共同生活を始めた俺。だけど、うぬぼれてはいけない。これは契約結婚。――そのはずなのに、「なんでそんな尽くしてくれるんだ？」と尋ねたら、彼女はむうっと頬を膨らませて「湊人くん、ニブすぎだよ……」と言ってきた。え……俺たちがしたのって契約結婚でいいんだよな……？　交際ゼロ日婚からはじまる、ひたすら幸せなだけの両片想いラブストーリー☆

"Wa, watashi o…… ~tsu, anata no o yomesan ni shite kuremasen ka……?" Gakuen ichi no bishōjo Hanae Riko ni gyaku puropōzu sa re, wake no wakaranai uchi ni, Riko to no kyōdō seikatsu o hajimeta ore. Dakedo, unuborete wa ikenai. Kore wa keiyaku kekkon.―― Sono hazunanoni, "nande son'na tsukushite kureru nda?" To tazunetara, kanojo wa mū tto hoho o fukurama sete "Minato hito-kun, Nibu-sugida yo……" to itte kita. E…… oretachi ga shita no tte keiyaku kekkonde ī nda yo na……? Kōsai zero-nichi kon kara hajimaru, hitasura shiawasena dake no ryō kataomoi rabusutōrī ☆
description.pt-br: Hanae Riko, a garota mais bonita da Takamine High, que todo garoto admira. Niiyama Minato, um garoto simples, que foi proposto em casamento por essa mesma garota. Sem saber o que está acontecendo, as cortinas de sua vida de recém-casados ​​sobem! Por alguma razão, minha noiva, que é muito fofa e me segue alegremente por toda parte, se recusa a sair do meu lado...

description.en:
After humanity's successful conquest of the Gate, peace has returned once again. However, the powerful psychic abilities of the Espers have become a double-edged sword for humanity, causing them great distress.

A new opportunity arises for Esper "NO.00 Michael," who is facing imminent death.

Adam, a retired soldier who has always struggled with the relationship between Guides and Espers, decides to give Michael, the cause of his leg injury, a second chance.

Adam gives Michael a new name, "Eve," in the hope that he can live a normal life, blending in with humanity.

The two, who have always fought on the front lines, risking their lives, embark on a journey to live a peaceful life in the embrace of humanity, dreaming of an ordinary existence.

The story of junior high school student new outlook on life. Its an inspiring tale of the many issues in our modern society. And the undue pressures of society to conform their standards instead of being yourself. For those who dealt with issues such as bullying, weight, and appearance. This series is a must read.

title.en: Drunken D-Rank Pulls Out the Legendary Sword

altTitles.ja-ro: Mannen D-rank no Chuunen Boukensha, Yotta Ikioi de Densetsu no Ken wo Hikkonuku

altTitles.fr: L'aventurier d'âge moyen, éternel Rank-D, retire l'épée légendaire en étant saoul.

altTitles.ja: 万年Dランクの中年冒険者、酔った勢いで伝説の剣を引っこ抜く

altTitles.en: Eternal D-Ranked Middle-aged Adventurer, Pulls Out the Legendary Sword While Drunk.

description.en: Lucas has a hard life. In his mid-thirties, a mixture of failures has left him old and crippled, playing pack mule to a couple of young adventures. Then one day, he pulls a magic sword from a stone that tells him he has been chosen to become a hero. Given a youthful form, Lucas must use the power of the sword to vanquish evil and attain a massive harem.
description.pt-br: O aventureiro de meia-idade, Lucas, passa seus dias com jovens aventureiros enquanto eles o tratam como um burro de carga. Mas enquanto ele estava bêbado, ele foi capaz de tirar a espada lendária de uma rocha que ninguém jamais foi capaz de fazer. Com o poder da espada lendária que a deusa da vitória e do amor criaram, o velho agora viaja seu caminho como o herói (sem querer) enquanto cria um harém. Antes de perguntar, não é isekai porque ele está neste mundo desde o primeiro dia.

altTitles.ja: 半人前の恋人

altTitles.th: มือใหม่หัดรัก

description.en: One day, when I was making school supplies in the art room, a very scary-looking girl was staring at me...!? Crafts girl vs. art boy romantic comedy!!
description.ru: В один прекрасный день Ибуки Синтаро поручили сделать ящик для предложений только потому, что он состоит в художественном кружке. Пока он работал с непривычными для него инструментами, он заметил на себе сверлящий взгляд устрашающей девчонки. Неожиданно она забирает у него пилу и энергичными движениями начинает резать доску! Так начинаются отношения между мальчишкой-художником и девчонкой-мастерицей!
description.th: “ในวันหนึ่ง ขณะที่กำลังทำงานอุปกรณ์ในห้องศิลปะ มีเด็กสาวที่มีหน้าตาน่ากลัวกำลังเฝ้ามองมาที่ผม...!?” เรื่องราวความรักคอมเมดี้ระหว่างสาวช่างฝีมือกับหนุ่มสายศิลป์!?
description.pt-br:
Um dia, quando eu estava fazendo material escolar na sala de arte, uma garota muito assustadora estava olhando para mim...!? 

Menina do artesanato vs. garoto da arte comédia romântica!!

altTitles.ja: あかね噺

description.en: Rakugo--the ultimate form of storytelling, where everything in a story is expressed with just your body and words. Shinta and his daughter Akane have been seduced by this wonderful form of classical entertainment. Having observed her father strive to pass the shin'uchi rakugo test, Akane will take her own steps into this unique world!
description.fr:
Shinta s'est perfectionné 13 ans durant afin d'atteindre le statut de Shin'uchi, le plus haut rang des rakugo-ka. Mais malgré sa très bonne performance lors de l'examen de passage, le juge de l'épreuve, l'émérite Maître Arakawa Issho, a décidé de renvoyer de l'école Arakawa l'ensemble des participants sans donner davantage d'explication ! Ainsi s'arrêta nette la carrière de Shinta, qui avait tant sacrifié pour accomplir son rêve…
Mais Akane, la fille de Shinta qui admirait son père et son rakugo plus que tout, ne compte pas en rester là !
description.th:
ที่สุดแห่งศิลปะการเล่าเรื่องที่ใช้ผู้แสดงเพียงหนึ่งคนและเรื่องเล่าเพียงหนึ่งเรื่อง --- "ราคุโกะ" นักราคุโกะ อาราคาวะ ชินตะและอาคาเนะลูกสาวของเขาต่างก็หลงเสน่ห์ของความบันเทิงอันสุดแสนจะเรียบง่ายนี้ ในวันที่ชินตะขึ้นเวทีแสดงในการสอบเลื่อนชั้นเป็นชินอุจิ อาคาเนะเองก็ได้ชมการแสดงนั้นอยู่และเส้นทางของนักราคุโกะที่อาคาเนะตัดสินใจก้าวเดินไปก็คือ---- มังงะราคุโกะขนานแท้ที่เหล่านักราคุโกะล้วนมาประชันฝีมือฟาดฟันกันได้เปิดฉากขึ้นแล้ว!

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.pt-br: Rakugo - a forma perfeita de contar histórias, na qual tudo na história é expresso apenas com seu corpo e palavras. Shinta e sua filha, Akane, foram seduzidos por essa maravilhosa forma clássica de entretenimento. Observando seu pai treinar para passar no teste de Shin’uchi, Akane avança neste mundo único.
